item.title: Chair for USC Deep Learning Course Presentation
item.description: Serve as chair for Computer Vision Session of the USC Deep Learning Course 2020 Spring. More details can be accessed here.

item.title: USC Deep Learning Presentation
item.description: As TA for USC Deep Learning course (EE599), I was impressed by the representations at the end of this semester from graduate students of USC. More details can be accessed here.

item.title: Group Seminar Presentation
item.description: Group seminar report, summarizing progress with regard to “LEARNING HUMAN-ROBOT AND ROBOT-WORLD INTERACTION”. Online website available here.
